# doubleAction

**Instance Property**

Sets the receiver’s double-click action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var doubleAction: Selector? { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **action**: The action method to invoke when the receiver is double-clicked.
title: doubleAction
